txt.en: 'They kidnapped the Elf in hope of some news about the stoppage of shipments flowing from out of Mirkwood. When trade halts, even thieves suffer. The problem is, the Elf is stone-faced and silent as all his stubborn kind. I fear they will lose patience and do him harm. You would do well to hurry.'
The captured raft-elf is somewhere in Esgaroth-of-old.\n\nYou should find the captured raft-elf.
One of the raft-elves has been kidnapped by smugglers in Esgaroth-of-old. Rescue him before it's too late!
Blengur can be found in Esgaroth-of-old.\n\nYou should defeat Blengur.
'I am out of patience, Elf. Tell us what we want to know.'
The captured raft-elf can be found in Esgaroth-of-old.\n\nYou should talk to the captured raft-elf.
Mervárth is standing guard outside Esgaroth-of-old.\n\nYou should talk to Mervárth.
'Thank you, [placeholder]. I think I can make it back to Loeglond on my own.'
'So you rescued the raft-elf, then? Good, good. You looked like you could handle it! I suppose my job here is done, thanks to you.'
